article_title: American Health Care Is Sick And Getting Sicker

article_metadata.author: Robert Pearl, M.D.

og.description: Clayton Christensen describes the health care industry as “sick and getting sicker.” In his interview with Dr. Robert Pearl, Christensen says there's only one way to fix this broken system.
